Uses of Class
org.apache.freemarker.core.valueformat.TemplateValueFormatFactory

  • Packages that use TemplateValueFormatFactory 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.core.valueformat
    Formatting values shown in templates: Base classes/interfaces
    org.apache.freemarker.core.valueformat.impl
    Formatting values shown in templates: Standard implementations.

    • Uses of TemplateValueFormatFactory in org.apache.freemarker.core.valueformat

      Subclasses of TemplateValueFormatFactory in org.apache.freemarker.core.valueformat 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TemplateDateFormatFactory
      Factory for a certain kind of date/time/dateTime formatting (TemplateDateFormat).
      class  TemplateNumberFormatFactory
      Factory for a certain kind of number formatting (TemplateNumberFormat).

    • Uses of TemplateValueFormatFactory in org.apache.freemarker.core.valueformat.impl

      Subclasses of TemplateValueFormatFactory in org.apache.freemarker.core.valueformat.impl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AliasTemplateDateFormatFactory
      Creates an alias to another format, so that the format can be referred to with a simple name in the template, rather than as a concrete pattern or other kind of format string.
      class  AliasTemplateNumberFormatFactory
      Creates an alias to another format, so that the format can be referred to with a simple name in the template, rather than as a concrete pattern or other kind of format string.
      class  ISOTemplateDateFormatFactory
      Creates TemplateDateFormat-s that follows ISO 8601 extended format that is also compatible with the XML Schema format (as far as you don't have dates in the BC era).
      class  JavaTemplateDateFormatFactory
      Deals with TemplateDateFormat-s that wrap a Java DateFormat.
      class  JavaTemplateNumberFormatFactory
      Deals with TemplateNumberFormat-s that wrap a Java NumberFormat.
      class  XSTemplateDateFormatFactory
      Creates TemplateDateFormat-s that follows the W3C XML Schema date, time and dateTime syntax.
